title: Raylib Raycaster
description: Written in C with the raylib library, this project demonstrates how raycasting can be used to draw a basic 3D scene.

title: Embedded System 3D Renderer
description: Created for an assessment, this is a simple 3D wireframe renderer which I create for use on a Nokia 5110 LCD display.

title: OpenGL 3D Rendering
description: Although quite ambitious this was one of my first attempts at creating a 3D rendering 'engine' from scratch. Some features that where implemented along the way are custom model loading, basic lighting, scene loading and some other things I forget.

title: Shady
description: Shady is a simple glsl writing environment created for rapid shader development. I am a big fan of ShaderToy and the impressive shaders that people have made there. I quite like graphics programming and created Shady to learn more in-depth how tools like ShaderToy work.
